titles.title: Landfill Gas Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a credit against tax proportional to the number of million British thermal units of natural gas produced by a high Btu fuel facility.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/28/2006--Introduced. Landfill Gas Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a business-related tax credit for the production of natural gas at a high Btu fuel facility (a facility that produces high Btu biomass fuel).
